title: Fashion History Now #18: In Vogue: The 1990's with Hamish Bowles
itunes:title: Fashion History Now #18: In Vogue: The 1990's with Hamish Bowles
description:
Cassidy and April "sit down" with Hamish Bowles, fashion historian, couture collector, Vogue editor, and new host of the podcast In Vogue: The 1990s.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
